mainTask: Write an article on benefits of meditation

subtasks.subtaskName: Research the benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, emotional regulation, etc.)
Research different types of meditation techniques (mindfulness, transcendental, etc.)
Create an outline for the article (introduction, types of meditation, benefits, how to start, conclusion)
Write the introduction to the article
Write the body paragraphs detailing different types of meditation and their benefits
Write a section on how to start meditating (finding a quiet space, setting intentions, etc.)
Write the conclusion summarizing the benefits and encouraging readers to try meditation
Edit and proofread the article for grammar, clarity, and flow
Find relevant images or illustrations to include in the article (optional)
Format the article for publication (add headings, subheadings, images)
